title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 416.2 - License applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 416.2 - License applications

State Regulations

All applications submitted for prior approval of the
superintendent to become a licensed check casher or licensed money transmitter
shall be accompanied by information demonstrating that the applicant will
maintain an anti-money laundering program that satisfies the requirements set
forth in section
416.1
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
416.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
